    • Constructor Detail

      • Platform

        public Platform(int[] platformPosition,
                boolean isGenerationSpot,
                AmmoCard platformAmmoCard,
                java.awt.Color platformColor,
                java.util.List<Orientation> doors)
         throws InvalidCardException
        Parameters:
        platformPosition - an array of length = 2, containing x and y coordinates
        isGenerationSpot - indicates if the platform is a generation spot
        platformAmmoCard - the ammunition card located on the platform
        platformColor - this four params will be parsed from json
        doors - .
        Throws:
        InvalidCardException - if the starting ammos card of the platform is null
